name: Bloodshed Sigil
description: With this sigil damage shall leave you blood-soaked, while in Captura your Warframe stands wreathed in the gore of its enemies. Honor the maiden of Death by donning her traditional garb.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Update 25
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bloodshed Sigil and Bleeding Body Ephemera still appearing visible when your Warframe is hidden (talking to Bounty givers in Orb Vallis).

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
patchlogs.fixes:
More fixes towards the Bloodshed Sigil not appearing correctly on the Operator. 
Fixed Bloodshed Sigil discrepancies in Operator transmissions. 
Fixed possible script error if the Bloodshed Sigil is equipped on your Operator when first loading into the Liset.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bloodshed Sigil not resetting after switching Warframes in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.5
patchlogs.changes: The Bloodshed Sigil now remains visible (if you’ve taken damage) when entering or exiting Cetus/Fortuna and Arsenals (applies to Operator as well).
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bloodshed Sigil resetting when entering Archwing in the Plains/Orb Vallis.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Mesa Prime - Hotfix 24.2.3
patchlogs.changes: The Bloodshed Sigil will show up in Relays/Liset provided you're returning from a mission where you took damage (more damage = more blood). We have also decreased the time it takes to appear by 20%!

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Bloodshed Sigil not appearing correctly when viewing it’s diorama via Chat link.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Bloodshed Sigil can now be equipped on Operators -

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
patchlogs.changes: Find the Bloodshed Sigil in the Market as part of the Garuda Bundle. You will be able to earn it free in a future Fortuna release

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Conclave Sigils are no longer required to gain Standing in Conclave, and Conclave Sigils can now be equipped in PvE Missions for purely cosmetic effect. Sigil Standing bonuses are now based on Conclave Rank.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some Conclave Sigils’ glow FX not properly covering the Sigil as per:       https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/525897-discovery-sigil-glow-problem-as-well-as-some-others-pvp-sigils/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed visual FX issue on the Conclave Sigil as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/525897-discovery-sigil-glow-problem-as-well-as-some-others-pvp-sigils/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Freedom and Discovery Conclave Sigils having the same icon.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with the Mastery Sigil not properly working on Operators. 
Fixed Mastery Sigil not appearing as intended the first time you enter the Operator Appearance tab.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.3.0 - Nightwave
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error related to Mastery Sigils.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mastery Sigil displaying the incorrect Rank number when viewing it in the player's Profile.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mastery Sigil appearing unranked on Titania and her Skins.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mastery Sigil not displaying your actual rank when viewed in a diorama.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Mastery Sigils displaying incorrectly on Operators.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.5 + 18.5.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed certain Warframes showing incorrect FX when Channeling with the Mastery Sigil.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.2.5
patchlogs.additions: The Mastery Sigil that was given out via Inbox message has been added to the Market for 1 Credit!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mastery Sigils overriding future equipped sigils and all sigil previews in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed various localization issues related to Mods and Mastery Sigils.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Mastery Sigil rank not displaying properly in profile diorama.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mastery Sigils being unable to identify players Mastery Rank correctly.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Rift Walker Prime Sigil flickering in the Arsenal.
